bookingQuestions.question: What stage is your company/project at?
What specific challenge would you like to discuss?
bookingQuestions.placeholder: Please describe your situation and what you're hoping to get out of this session...

bookingQuestions.question: Do you have any materials you'd like to share beforehand? (Optional)

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the session
policies.rescheduling: You can reschedule up to 2 hours before the session
policies.refund: Full refund if expert cancels. 50% refund for cancellations with less than 24h notice
policies.preparation: You'll receive a calendar invite and video link 1 hour before the session
